item.description:
This Saturday night marks the end of Daylight Saving Time. We gain an extra hour of sleep! So let’s get out there and earn it! Or stay up all night instead! Join Elizabeth and Emily on a fun filled evening revisiting a few of our favorite downtown locales. We’ll be at the Wild Colonial at 8pm and plan to stay at least until 9. Sometime between 9 & 10 we’ll walk over the bridge to the Red Fez – We’ll be sure to be upstairs at the Fez from 10-11pm. Beyond that – who knows! So break out your winter coat, gloves, scarves, hat, long johns – whatever it takes! And help us celebrate as we fall back in time.

Wild Colonial 8-9pm
250 South Water St
Providence, RI

Red Fez - upstairs 10-11pm
49 Peck St
Providence, RI
item.name: End of Daylight Saving Time Celebration!
